html: (2 Nephi 15:13)."My people are gone into captivity, because they have no knowledge." Because of their wayward-ness, the people have gone into spiritual bondage. They lack knowledge of God and His ways. The Lord declared, "It is impossible for a man to be saved in ignorance." (D&C 131:6.) In ignorance of what? The things of God! The apostle Paul wrote, "The things of God knoweth no man except he has the Spirit of God." (JST 1 Corinthians 2:11.)
